channel.title: Ronin Boy Episode 1 is Live
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Ronin Boy Episode 1 is Live"

item.title: Ronin Boy Episode 1 is Live
item.content:encoded:
The first of a thirteen episode season is live:
http://community.livejournal.com/bvs_news/4896.html

I'll be posting one chapter a week for thirteen weeks. If it is popular enough, I'll "renew" it for another season.
